scenes.description: Gura concludes her performance of 'Shiawase no Recipe' with a final dance move and pose.
The stage goes dark during a brief transition as Gura prepares for the next segment.
Gura reappears on stage, striking poses and singing the ending refrain of the previous song.
MC section where Gura discusses her admiration for Tatsuro Yamashita and her current music preferences.
High-energy performance of the song 'Balalaika' featuring Gura and Kiara with small mascot-like dancers.

subtitles.english: Enjoy the taste of the recipe for happiness...
Recipe for happiness...

subtitles.original: Tatsuro... Tatsuro Yamashita will forever be
subtitles.english: Tatsuro... Tatsuro Yamashita will forever be

subtitles.original: one of my favorite musical artists.
subtitles.english: one of my favorite musical artists.

subtitles.original: Seriously. I can always find a way to
subtitles.english: Seriously. I can always find a way to

subtitles.original: recommend people to listen to his music.
subtitles.english: recommend people to listen to his music.

subtitles.english: Actually, lately, my summer playlist has consisted of

subtitles.original: and then Jeremy Soule as well.
subtitles.english: and then Jeremy Soule as well.

subtitles.original: I have like two modes right now.

subtitles.original: It's either nostalgia for a 1980s summer or, or,

subtitles.original: Nam nam, I can taste it too. It tastes like herbs and spices.
subtitles.english: Nam nam, I can taste it too. It tastes like herbs and spices.
